creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: black brocade head cloth with gold thread and two red border stripes near each end; gold stripes at each end with black and gold zigzags in between; gold football shapes in center with large areas of tiny gold geometricized flowers on either side; flowered area interspersed with solid black areas; reverse on back with gold as main color; 7" braided tassels at each end; black section between
title: Head cloth (kasrawan or musawwara)
